scenario_text.value: Hm... It appears to be an old well.

Oh, hey, this is like that movie where after
you watch a video you die seven days later.

Minoru, cut it out! I can’t handle any of
that horror stuff!

But it’s...it’s just a well, right? It’s not
c-cursed or anything, is it?
It’s...empty. The well is dry. Only...

There’s something stuck to the bottom. Looks
like a talisman?
Yes, it appears to be some sort of seal...

You...you mean like the kind they put on
haunted rooms in old inns? That sounds bad...
Yeah... Maybe we shouldn’t mess with this.
I kind of want to take one of those things.

Hey, stop! I’m pretty sure those are the real
deal.
C-c-can’t we just get out of here?

This is definitely where that groaning sound
is coming from.

(I’m really curious, but between the spooky
atmosphere and those seals, I don’t know...)

(I don’t want to go down there, but...we’ve
been everywhere else.)

(That well is our only lead right now. Maybe
we should go down and check it out?)
(Good question...)
Let’s check it out.
Forget it. I’m scared.
Let’s keep looking.
Let’s check it out.
Come on, guys, let’s investigate.
Wait, don’t you think that’s dangerous?

At this point, what isn’t dangerous? Besides,
we won’t learn anything by doing nothing.
*gulp* Oh...
You have a point. Okay, let’s go.

Now there’s no telling what’s down there, so
everyone be ready for anything.
Forget it. I’m scared.
Just forget it. This is way too scary!

Right? It’s just...too creepy, isn’t it?
Let’s go back. Yeah, glad that’s settled!

I thought you wanted to save the world. Are
you really going to let this scare you off?
Oooh... I guess...you’ve got a point.
*whimper*...
All right! I’m all set! Time to go!
Minoru?!

If we want to save the world, we c-can’t let
this stop us!

You’re right. I’ll go with you. You helped me
make up my mind.

(By the time I turn back, everyone’s ready to
go. Nobody looks scared anymore.)
Let’s keep looking.

Let’s keep looking! It never hurts to double
check, and we might have missed something!

Takuma, I understand you must be afraid, but
please, stop.

This is what we’ve been looking for, and you
know it. You’ll just have to be courageous.
I...I know, but...

Oh, enough stalling! Let’s just get this over
with!
Move it, Takuma. I’m going in.
Ryo?!

Just so you all know, I’m goin’ on ahead. You
can come after me when you find your guts.
Hmph, cut the tough guy act. I’m goin’ too.
I... I guess if we have to, we have to!
Thanks, Ryo. But sorry, I’d better go first.
I can see your legs are shaking.
Aw, man. So much for that.

No, it was really helpful. Anyway, I’ll go on
ahead. You take your time.
Let’s go, everybody!
Carefully...carefully... There!
So, this is the bottom of the well.
Is everyone here?
Yes, everyone’s down. Only it’s pitch black.
Wha?! What happened? The bottom collapsed?!
